claim: The average score of posts owned by the user csgillespie is 12.0.
extra_info: "csgillespie" is the DisplayName of user; average score refers to AVG(Score)
reasoning: The average score of posts owned by user 'csgillespie' is 9.0 according to the database (AVG(Score) from posts joined with users on OwnerUserId where DisplayName = 'csgillespie'), not 12.0 as the claim states.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE users
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    Reputation      INTEGER          null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    DisplayName     TEXT null,
    LastAccessDate  DATETIME     null,
    WebsiteUrl      TEXT null,
    Location        TEXT null,
    AboutMe         TEXT     null,
    Views           INTEGER          null,
    UpVotes         INTEGER          null,
    DownVotes       INTEGER          null,
    AccountId       INTEGER          null,
    Age             INTEGER          null,
    ProfileImageUrl TEXT null
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE users
(
    Id              INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    Reputation      INTEGER          null,
    CreationDate    DATETIME     null,
    DisplayName     TEXT null,
    LastAccessDate  DATETIME     null,
    WebsiteUrl      TEXT null,
    Location        TEXT null,
    AboutMe         TEXT     null,
    Views           INTEGER          null,
    UpVotes         INTEGER          null,
    DownVotes       INTEGER          null,
    AccountId       INTEGER          null,
    Age             INTEGER          null,
    ProfileImageUrl TEXT null
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.text: Now let me query for the average score of posts owned by user "csgillespie":

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT AVG(p.Score) FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.OwnerUserId = u.Id WHERE u.DisplayName = 'csgillespie';"
input.description: Get average score of posts by csgillespie

content.text:
The database shows that the average score of posts owned by user "csgillespie" is **9.0**, not **12.0** as the claim states.
